Author: bleepbloophumanoid
Text: Please don’t purge. It’s a rollercoaster you don’t want to get on. It encourages you to overeat because you figure, “whatever I’ll just purge it,” then overtime you lose control over your ability to eat normal portions. It took me years to fix my binge eating habits, and I still struggle occasionally today.

Author: regularBDD
Text: its okay! just remember its healthy to eat three meals a day, its fine ♡ please dont purge😔
